body: Figured out my issue with this. Kiss Shot isn't human. I appreciate the vampire teeth, but she also has pointy ears. She's CLEARLY not human, and this, along with her ample, gravity-defying breasts, indicate this. Fuck her or don't, but making her look more human destroys the characterization and pulls me out of it. IKR. It's been 7+ years, but wrong is wrong. I only mention it bc the characters are VERY accurate except for this.
My good sir this is some really wholesome shit right here, an 8/10 for art style and 7/10 for plot, please do make more.
It not is bad, but not good, it is  only ok.
The donut is salty at the end because he came on it
